audio_to_llm.description: **[Alpha]** Enable audio to llm processing for this audio

prompts.description: The list of prompts applied on the audio transcription
example: Extract the key points from the transcription

audio_to_llm_config.description: **[Alpha]** Audio to llm configuration, if `audio_to_llm` is enabled

audio_url.description: URL to a Gladia file or to an external audio or video file

callback.description: Enable callback for this transcription. If true, the `callback_config` property will be used to customize the callback behaviour

allOf.description: The HTTP method to be used. Allowed values are `POST` or `PUT` (default: `POST`)

method.description: The HTTP method to be used. Allowed values are `POST` or `PUT` (default: `POST`)

url.description: The URL to be called with the result of the transcription

callback_config.description: Customize the callback behaviour (url and http method)

callback_url.description: **[Deprecated]** Use `callback`/`callback_config` instead. Callback URL we will do a `POST` request to with the result of the transcription

languages.description: Specify the languages you want to use when detecting multiple languages

items.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

code_switching_config.description: **[Deprecated]** Use `language_config` instead. Specify the configuration for code switching

context_prompt.description: **[Deprecated]** Context to feed the transcription model with for possible better accuracy

custom_metadata.description: Custom metadata you can attach to this transcription

custom_spelling.description: **[Alpha]** Enable custom spelling for this audio

spelling_dictionary.description: The list of spelling applied on the audio transcription

custom_spelling_config.description: **[Alpha]** Custom spelling configuration, if `custom_spelling` is enabled

custom_vocabulary.description: **[Beta]** Can be either boolean to enable custom_vocabulary for this audio or an array with specific vocabulary list to feed the transcription model with

default_intensity.description: Default intensity for the custom vocabulary

vocabulary.description: Specific vocabulary list to feed the transcription model with. Each item can be a string or an object with the following properties: value, intensity, pronunciations, language.

intensity.description: The global intensity of the feature.

allOf.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

language.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

pronunciations.description: The pronunciations used in the transcription.

value.description: The text used to replace in the transcription.

custom_vocabulary_config.description: **[Beta]** Custom vocabulary configuration, if `custom_vocabulary` is enabled

detect_language.description: **[Deprecated]** Use `language_config` instead. Detect the language from the given audio

diarization.description: Enable speaker recognition (diarization) for this audio

max_speakers.description: Maximum number of speakers in the audio

min_speakers.description: Minimum number of speakers in the audio

number_of_speakers.description: Exact number of speakers in the audio

diarization_config.description: Speaker recognition configuration, if `diarization` is enabled

display_mode.description: **[Alpha]** Allows to change the output display_mode for this audio. The output will be reordered, creating new utterances when speakers overlapped

enable_code_switching.description: **[Deprecated]** Use `language_config` instead.Detect multiple languages in the given audio

allOf.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

language.description: **[Deprecated]** Use `language_config` instead. Set the spoken language for the given audio (ISO 639 standard)

code_switching.description: If true, language will be auto-detected on each utterance. Otherwise, language will be auto-detected on first utterance and then used for the rest of the transcription. If one language is set, this option will be ignored.

languages.description: If one language is set, it will be used for the transcription. Otherwise, language will be auto-detected by the model.

items.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

name_consistency.description: **[Alpha]** Enable names consistency for this audio

named_entity_recognition.description: **[Alpha]** Enable named entity recognition for this audio

pii_redaction.description: Enable PII redaction for this audio

processed_text_type.description: The type of processed text to return (marker or mask)

pii_redaction_config.description: PII redaction configuration, if `pii_redaction` is enabled

punctuation_enhanced.description: **[Alpha]** Use enhanced punctuation for this audio

sentiment_analysis.description: Enable sentiment analysis for this audio

structured_data_extraction.description: **[Alpha]** Enable structured data extraction for this audio

classes.description: The list of classes to extract from the audio transcription

structured_data_extraction_config.description: **[Alpha]** Structured data extraction configuration, if `structured_data_extraction` is enabled

subtitles.description: Enable subtitles generation for this transcription

formats.description: Subtitles formats you want your transcription to be formatted to

items.description: Subtitles formats you want your transcription to be formatted to

maximum_characters_per_row.description: Maximum number of characters per row in a subtitle

maximum_duration.description: Maximum duration of a subtitle in seconds

maximum_rows_per_caption.description: Maximum number of rows per caption

minimum_duration.description: Minimum duration of a subtitle in seconds

allOf.description: Style of the subtitles. Compliance mode refers to : https://loc.gov/preservation/digital/formats//fdd/fdd000569.shtml#:~:text=SRT%20files%20are%20basic%20text,alongside%2C%20example%3A%20%22MyVideo123

style.description: Style of the subtitles. Compliance mode refers to : https://loc.gov/preservation/digital/formats//fdd/fdd000569.shtml#:~:text=SRT%20files%20are%20basic%20text,alongside%2C%20example%3A%20%22MyVideo123

subtitles_config.description: Configuration for subtitles generation if `subtitles` is enabled

allOf.description: The type of summarization to apply

type.description: The type of summarization to apply

context.description: Context information to improve translation accuracy

context_adaptation.description: Enables or disables context-aware translation features that allow the model to adapt translations based on provided context.

informal.description: Forces the translation to use informal language forms when available in the target language.

lipsync.description: Whether to apply lipsync to the translated transcription.

match_original_utterances.description: Align translated utterances with the original ones

allOf.description: Model you want the translation model to use to translate

model.description: Model you want the translation model to use to translate

target_languages.description: Target language in `iso639-1` format you want the transcription translated to

items.description: Target language in `iso639-1` format you want the transcription translated to

result_url.description: Prebuilt URL with your transcription `id` to fetch the result

201.description: The pre recorded job has been initiated

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the error

timestamp.description: Date of when the error occurred

validation_errors.description: List of validation errors, if any

400.description: Something is wrong with the request

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the error

timestamp.description: Date of when the error occurred

401.description: You don't have the permissions to initiate a new pre recorded job

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the error

timestamp.description: Date of when the error occurred

422.description: The parameters you gave are incorrect

summary: Initiate a new pre recorded job
